articles.title: Officials of Ministries, National Institutions and Other Units Visit Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
articles.content:
Officials of Ministries, National Institutions and Other Units Visit Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and officials of ministries, national institutions and units at all levels and people from all walks of life in Pyongyang visited the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage to spend the New Year's Day together with children. 
					 Servicepersons of the KPA and members of the Ministry of People's Security gave a lot of foodstuff including honey and meat and living necessities to the children. 
					
					 The children of the baby home and orphanage enjoyed the holiday with officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations in the city including the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Pyongyang City People's Committee, the Ministry of Public Health, Kyonghung Guidance Bureau and the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea and other people. 
					
					 The visitors gave a variety of toys and new clothes to the children. 
					
					 Officials of the Education Commission and Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and its students also visited the baby home and orphanage and gave them confectionery and school things, spending the holiday.

articles.title: DPRK Athletes Vow to Win More Golds at Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Athletes Vow to Win More Golds at Int'l Games
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Encouraged by supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address, the sportspersons in the DPRK have turned out in a fresh effort to display the honor of the country at international games.
					 Last year the DPRK athletes registered spectacular successes in different international tournaments, bringing great pleasure to all servicepersons and civilians of the country.
					
					 They obtained a lot of gold medals in the 17th Asian Games and other international games. The DPRK emerged the strongest in Asian women's football and showed a rapid progress in the weightlifting event.
					
					 Kim Kwang Min, chief coach of the women's football team, told KCNA:
					
					 Nothing will be impossible if we, players and coaches, display our mental power to the full. 
					
					 We will show good results in this year's international games, always cherishing the people's trust and expectation, and thus contribute to significantly celebrating the 70th anniversary of national liberation and the 70th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Om Yun Chol, a weightlifter of the Amnokgang Sports Team who is twice world championship holder and Olympic gold medalist, said that he would do his best to turn the country into a sports power with more gold medals.

articles.title: Japanese Government Urged to Make Official Apology and Legal Reparation
articles.content:
Japanese Government Urged to Make Official Apology and Legal Reparation
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1159th Wednesday meeting outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Dec. 31 last year, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The organization said that victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army passed away without having their grudge vented against those who committed the crimes of sexual slavery.
					
					 Wednesday meetings of victims and members of civic and public organizations are going on to denounce the thrice-cursed sexual violence committed by the Japanese imperialists and call upon the Japanese government to make an apology and reparation for its past wrongdoings, it noted.
					
					 It demanded Japan make an apology and legal reparation to victims living in Japan.

articles.title: Korean-style Socialism Advances under Banner of Juche: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean-style Socialism Advances under Banner of Juche: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party."
					 The work, published on Jan. 3, Juche 81 (1992), indicates that the historical lesson in building socialism is to steadily consolidate the driving force of the revolution with conviction in socialism and proper guiding idea, preserve socialist principle and boost comradely unity and cooperation based on independence.
					
					 It deals with the idea that it is the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for building socialism to thoroughly implement the three revolutions- ideological, technical and cultural- while strengthening people's power and steadily increasing its function and role and it also proves the vitality of the idea.
					
					 The past two decades were the days when the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism were clearly proved for the scientific accuracy and truth of the idea and theory indicated in the work, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to carry forward and accomplish the socialist cause of Juche started and led by great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary feats performed by Kim Jong Il have been successfully carried forward and developed, and the DPRK has demonstrated its might as an invincible military power under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation have been fully demonstrated to the whole world thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un who is bringing about one victory after another in fierce confrontation with the U.S. and in the struggle for defending socialism with his matchless grit and pluck, outstanding military strategy and rare commanding art.
					
					 All service personnel and people of the DPRK are strong in their spirit to further consolidate the victory they achieved in building a thriving socialist nation and push ahead with the general advance for this year under the guidance of the WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK and DPRK Government's Avowed Idea of Foreign Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK and DPRK Government's Avowed Idea of Foreign Policy
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) --  Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 dealt with the idea of foreign policy to be invariably held fast to by the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government. 
					 International friendship and cooperation among peace-loving countries and nations serve as driving power and condition for victory to dynamically push ahead with the accomplishment of the cause of global independence, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an essential and just option under the present international situation to develop the good-neighborly relations with all countries and all peoples on the principle of respect for sovereignty.
					
					 Each country has a right to preserve peace and realize sovereignty and a duty to respect the sovereignty, not harassing peace of other countries.
					
					 Independent stand is a fundamental one that the popular masses should preserve in all activities and also a foundation of the international friendship and cooperation. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to develop the good-neighborly relations and friendly and cooperative relations with all countries that respect its national sovereignty and are friendly to it.
					
					 It depends on the U.S. attitude whether the state of armistice and belligerency is removed or not, and durable peace on the Korean Peninsula is preserved or not.
					
					 The U.S. should make a bold political switchover, not relying on an anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and reckless moves for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK always remains unchanged in its stand.
					
					 It will strive to develop friendly and cooperative relations and good neighborly relations with all the countries that respect its national sovereignty and are friendly to it, in the future, too, and thus contribute to foiling the war policy of imperialist aggression forces and their moves of dominationism, preserving peace and realizing global independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Final Victory in Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Hastening Final Victory in Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un this year serves as important guidelines in further enhancing the spirit of leap forward and advance of Songun Korea which entered a new era of prosperity while coping with the prevailing situation and circumstances on its own initiative, and a great programme for opening a bright prospect in the nationwide struggle for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address comprehensively indicated the tasks and ways for glorifying this significant year as a year of great victories and revolutionary and auspicious events, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!" This militant slogan represents the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to instill the valuable revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu deeper into the minds of all service personnel and people and maximize the tremendous might of the spirit in defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 This spirit serves as a lifeline which guarantees for eternity the mightiness of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea and its prosperity, and as a powerful treasured sword for final victory.
					
					 It also serves as the most precious wealth in the on-going general advance and a treasured sword for sure victory.
					
					 This spirit is the driving force helping resolutely smash the desperate efforts of all hostile forces and achieve final victory in defending socialism.
					
					 The blizzards of Paektu is warm for the revolutionaries as it makes them harden their revolutionary faith and brings them miracles and victories but strong for the enemies as it deals sledge-hammer blows at them.
					
					 No formidable enemy and difficulties can prevent the vigorous advance of the army and people of the DPRK advancing in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Total Reexamination of Contract on Sharing Information Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Total Reexamination of Contract on Sharing Information Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an editorial on Dec. 30 last year which demanded the total reexamination of the contract on sharing information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					 It was wrong that the south Korean regime signed the contract on Dec. 26 without informing the "National Assembly" of it, the editorial noted.
					
					 The U.S. has forcibly pushed forward the contract with the purpose of knocking into shape the triangular military alliance, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The information about "nukes in the north and missile threat from it" is directly linked with the U.S.-led missile shield.
					
					 The contract not only gives help to Japan in emerging as a military giant but also provides it with huge margin for its exercise of the "right to collective self-defense."
					
					 The editorial called for the reexamination of the contract from the beginning.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Crackdown upon Labor Movement Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Crackdown upon Labor Movement Denounced
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo carried an article written by Kwak Tong Gi, permanent researcher of the "Uri Institute for Social Studies", on Dec. 29 last year denouncing the puppet group for making desperate efforts to suppress labor movement.
					 The article noted that the suppression of the labor movement has been intensified under the regime of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The present regime is seeking to totally dissolve the Teachers Union, not content with crackdown, while speaking ill of the trade union's act of accepting the dismissed teachers as members of the trade union.
					
					 The Supreme Court judged the action of the management which dismissed en masse workers of Ssangyong Motors as the "necessary step for the business operation", pushing the workers to the edge of cliff. 
					
					 As the workers' strike against the privatization of railways got momentum, the present regime has engaged in the suppressive operations by mobilizing the ministry of Transportation, the ministry of Employment and Labor, the Information Service, Police Agency, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Doctors Accused of Neglecting People's Lives
articles.content:
S. Korean Doctors Accused of Neglecting People's Lives
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- South Korean papers on Dec. 29 last year disclosed the wicked behaviors of south Korean doctors of giving no heed to the lives of patients.
					 Posted on an internet website are a photo and video showing plastic surgeons of a hospital in Kangnam District, Seoul who were having a party beside an operating table with a patient on it, the papers said, adding:
					
					 This is the reason that plastic surgery patients died during operation one after another.
					
					 No heed is given to the people's security even in the field of public health as a result of unpopular rule that has been pursued by the successive ruling quarters.
					
					 This is just a tip of examples of human rights abuses in south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Highly Praised by Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Highly Praised by Peruvian Political Party
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union released a statement on December 28 last year on the occasion of the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Warmly congratulating Kim Jong Un on the occasion, the statement added:
					
					 We are recollecting the exploits performed by HE Kim Jong Un who has wisely led the Korean army and people in their struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and nation by inspecting lots of units of the People's Army during the past three years after visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on January 1, 2012, thereby successfully carrying forward the Juche-based revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The KPA has developed to be invincible revolutionary armed forces capable of winning victories over any formidable enemies thanks to outstanding commanding art of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Through the appearance of the DPRK which has demonstrated only victory in confrontation with the imperialist forces in the past three years the world came to know better about the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We extend glory to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who is leading the Korean army and people to the road of victories.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on the occasions of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included a reading session on a work of Marshal Kim Jong Un and a film show by the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and a celebration meeting by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and a similar meeting at the Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Mongolia on December 22 and 23 last year.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics read out the work of Kim Jong Un "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA had a great historic significance in the development of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in his speech said that Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into an army strong in ideology and into invincible revolutionary armed forces with his unique Songun politics by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung as it is.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Suk devoted her all to upholding the noble intention of the President.
					
					 He said that the Korean people, being possessed of nuclear deterrent for self-defence, are advancing with confidence along the road of independence, Songun and socialism chosen by themselves under the leadership of Kim Jong Un no matter what others may say.
					
					 The director of the Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Mongolia referred to the fact that the kindergarten organized colorful events on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu, adding that the august name of Kim Jong Suk is kept deep in the hearts of the Mongolian people and children.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Germany and Mongolia.

articles.title: Beninese Political Party, Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Moves
articles.content:
Beninese Political Party, Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Moves
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- A Beninese political party and organizations released statements on December 23 and 24 last year as regards the forcible disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), progressive political party of south Korea.
					 The Socialist Party of Benin in its statement said that it is an unprecedented fascist violation that the south Korean authorities prodded the "constitutional court" into forcibly disbanding the UPP, legal political party.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The reality is that freedom of activities is provided to political parties in any countries, and that progressive political parties are legally acting in capitalist countries, too.
					
					 But only in south Korea the political party was branded as a criminal one and forcibly dissolved under suppression.
					
					 Branding the south Korean authorities' high-handed and outrageous brutality as an unpardonable challenge to democracy and human rights and a fascist violation of the south Korean people hoping for independence, democracy and reunification, the Socialist Party of Benin severely denounces them.
					
					 We categorically reject the south Korean authorities' disbandment of the UPP and call on the world progressive political parties valuing democracy and justice to raise voices of denouncing it.
					
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities recently decided the disbandment of UPP by using the "constitutional court" as they regarded the party as a thorn in their flesh.
					
					 South Korea is just the place where arbitrary practices of disbanding political parties and organizations, that are being out of favor, are enforced without any hesitation by dint of power.
					
					 We strongly denounce the disbandment, considering it was prompted by the scheme to wipe out the progressive political parties standing in the van of the righteous struggle, and furthermore split and weaken the whole progressive forces.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge S. Korean Authorities to Stop Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge S. Korean Authorities to Stop Suppression of Progressive Forces
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on Dec. 19 last year denouncing the south Korean puppet group's fascist action against the Unified Progressive Party.
					 The criminal decision made by the south Korean puppet authorities on dissolving the legitimate political party is an extension of suppression and fascist terrorism perpetrated by them against pro-reunification democratic and progressive personages in the past, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Due to their moves south Korea has been further fascistized and turned into a big jail where progressive ideas are stamped out.
					
					 South Korea is a society where the rich get richer and the poor poorer as it is ruled by corrupt political group sycophantic to the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities collect a huge amount of money from people for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea every year.
					
					 They have enforced unprecedentedly heinous fascist dictatorship and reduced south Korea into the worst human rights tundra and a theatre of fascism where everything progressive is suppressed.
					
					 The statement demanded them stop at once suppression and terrorism against the progressive forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a abrir el camino de avance con espiritu revolucionario de Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a abrir el camino de avance con espiritu revolucionario de Paektu
Pyongyang, 3 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto el dia 3 el editorial que senala en particular:
					El mensaje del Ano Nuevo pronunciado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un sirve de una guia programatica que redobla el temperamento de salto y el avance de la Corea de Songun que ha acogido una nueva era de prosperidad  enfrentandose con iniciativa a la situacion y las circunstancias creadas, y deviene un gran programa que dio radiante perspectiva a la lucha pannaiconal por la reintegracion territorial.
					
					En su mensaje, el Mariscal presento plena y claramente las tareas y medios para hacer brillar el presente ano, en que se celebraran las fiestas significativas, como un ano de gran victoria y gran jubilo revolucionario.
					
					"!Todos, con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, desarrollemos la ofensiva general para anticipar la victoria final!", esta consigna combativa lleva el noble proposito del Mariscal de inscribir en el corazon de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo el valor precioso del espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y dar prueba al maximo el poderio inagotable de ella en la defensa del socialismo y la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					El espiritu revolucionario del Paektu es la arteria que hace continuar la potencialidad y la prosperidad eterna de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il, y una poderosa espada para la victoria final.
					
					La riqueza y la espada mas preciosas en la marcha general de hoy es el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu.
					
					Este espiritu sirve de una fuerza motriz  que permite frustrar tajantemente las maniobras persistentes de todas las fuerzas hostiles y lograr la victoria decisiva en la defensa del socialismo.
					
					Nadie puede detener la marcha del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea armados estrictamente con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el del viento cortante del Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere a la politica exterior de PTC y RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere a la politica exterior de PTC y RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de enero (ACNC) -- En el mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un aclaro el ideal de politica exterior a ser mantenido invariablemente por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En un articulo individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la amistad y cooperacion internacionales entre los paises y naciones amantes de la paz constituyen la fuerza motriz que impulsa activamente la verificacion de la causa de  la independencia en todo el mundo y sirven de una condicion que permite lograr la victoria, y prosigue:
					
					Fortalecer las relaciones de buena vecindad y amistad con todos los paises y pueblo en el principio de respetar la soberania es una opcion indispensable y justa bajo la situacion internacional de hoy.
					
					Todos los paises tienen el derecho a preservar la paz y realizar la independencia y al mismo tiempo asumen el deber de no destruir la paz y respetar la soberania de otros paises.
					
					La posicion independiente deviene la fundamental a ser mantenida por las masas populares en todas sus actividades y ademas la base en las verdaderas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion internacionales.
					
					La RPDC mantiene una invariable posicion de desarrollar las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises que respeten nuestra soberania y nos traten con amistad.
					
					La eliminacion o no del estado de armisticio y las relaciones beligerantes entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y el aseguramiento o no de la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana dependen enteramente de la actitud de Estados Unidos.
					
					EE.UU. debe cambiar con valentia su politica sin recurrir a su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC y las imprudentes maquinaciones agresivas.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC.
					
					Tambien en el futuro, la RPDC defendera la paz frustrando la politica belica y las maniobras dominacionistas de las fuerzas agresivas imperialistas y contribuira activamente a realizar la independencia del mundo al establecer y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad, cooperacion y buena vecindad con todos los paises que respeten la soberania de nuestro pais y nos traten con amistad.
